Title: Indians on TV
Writer: Aziz Ansari (created by), Alan Yang (created by), Aziz Ansari, Alan Yang, Zoe Jarman (story editor), Sarah Peters (story editor)
Actors: Aziz Ansari, Kelvin Yu, Lena Waithe, Ravi Patel
Plot: Frustrated with the limited availability of roles and frequent type-casting of Indian actors, Dev has to make an ethical decision about the future of his career when he gets his hands on a TV executives racist emails.
